channel.title: Please help me
channel.description:
Hello, I just heard about moparscape and private servers and I wanna know how to use it. I got a few questions that maybe someone can answer?
1) When I go to www.moparisthebest.com, I see "For the Server Status page click here, For the Forums click here" and I see a black box with nothing in it(surrounded by white). what do I do?
2) How do I play other peoples game or private server thingy?(or does this have to do with my first problem)
please can someone help me?

item.title: Please help me
item.dc:creator: @here_a_llama here a llama
